column1: They saying we got the corona virus, it’s crazy cause ever since we stopped talking I’ve been sick of myself. Idk why but this corona virus shit got me thinking about how I got infected from your love, hope everything is good with you shorty. Be safe out there.
RT @_AdoreHannaa: Due to #COVID19 aka #Coronavirus Ill be sending the first 500 people to like & retweet this $300 -$1500 through CashApp,…
